\textbf{MINIT MESYUARAT JAWATANKUASA SIRI `r params$siri`, `r params$tkh`}
\textbf{DI BILIK MESYUARAT WISMA PERWIRA ATM, KUALA LUMPUR}

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, comment=NA)

library(jsonlite)
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)

minit <- read_json("minit_exco_3_22.json")
```

### HADIR: 

```{r hadir}
# lst <- paste(minit$Hadir$nama,minit$Hadir$Singkatan,minit$Hadir$Jawatan,sep = " - ")
lst <- tibble("Nama"=unlist(minit$Hadir$nama),"Singkatan"=unlist(minit$Hadir$Singkatan),"Jawatan"=unlist(minit$Hadir$Jawatan))
lst %>% 
  kbl(booktabs = T) %>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = "hold_position",position = "left")
```

### TIDAK HADIR (DENGAN MAAF)

```{r tidak hadir}
nst <- tibble("Nama"=unlist(minit$`Tidak hadir (dengan maaf)`$Nama),"Singkatan"=unlist(minit$`Tidak hadir (dengan maaf)`$Singkatan),"Jawatan"=unlist(minit$`Tidak hadir (dengan maaf)`$Jawatan))
nst %>% 
  kbl(booktabs = T) %>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = "hold_position",position = "left")
```
